title: Familya
overview: Familya, which started shooting in Istanbul and continues in Ayvalık, also draws attention with its successful cast. In addition to the master actor Uğur Yücel, Erkan Kolçak Köstendil, Bülent Emrah Parlak, Cansu Tosun, Şükran Ovalı, Sezer Avcı, Aybüke Pusat, Murat Ceylan, Barış Yıldız, as well as Gökhan Kıraç, Enis Arıkan, Olgu Baran Kubilay, Bekir Çiçekdemir, Berat Efe Parlar, İpek Ayaz Kortunç, Murat Şahan, Ozan Coşkun, Neslihan Arslan and Güven Kıraç. While everyone was experiencing great joy with the goal scored by İlhan Mansız in the Turkey-Senegal match in the World Cup in 2002, "Familya" started to bring their family together again with the news that the shattered Beyoğlu family and father Yaşar Beyoğlu (Uğur Yücel) received years later. tells the story of his work.
